thread.section_title: Restaurant Equipment Club Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Restaurant Equipment Club | restaurantequipmentclub.com
thread.title: James
thread.title_full: Restaurant Equipment Club reviewed by James

author: James
title: James
text: The guys at restaurant equipment club were my saviors! With weeks to go before opening for our summer season I met these guys and handed them I project that sounded impossible! But the man, the myth, the legend Tony Donato put together a custom design and an installation schedule and made it happen!! Not only that he came in thousands of dollars under my budget!! Hours before we opened we had a brand new fully functional kitchen line! Tony is the man! Everyone at the company was great to work with!
